subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire, the league’s second-leading scorer, will be the Knicks’ first All-Star starter selection since Patrick Ewing in 1997.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire, the league’s second-leading scorer, will be the Knicks’ first All-Star starter selection since Patrick Ewing in 1997.
